Description: “Header” record that describes the race card. There is only one header record per file.
“Race” record contains information about each race. There is one “R” record for each race run on the card that day.
“Starter” record contains information about each starter on the card.
“Exotic Wagering” record contains information about all exotic wagers on the	card. Win
“Attendance” record contains information about the attendance and handle	wagered on the card.

“Comment” record contains a comment about extra ordinary events occurring for a chart. Such things as late medication disqualifications or a race being declare unofficial because of a malfunction with the starting gate
